Class MessageFormatter.MessageFormatterMessageFormat

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.text.MessageFormatter.MessageFormatterMessageFormat
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageFormatter
Enclosing interface:
MessageFormatter
public static final class MessageFormatter.MessageFormatterMessageFormat extends Object implements MessageFormatter
The MessageFormatterMessageFormat class is an implementation of the MessageFormatter interface that formats messages using the MessageFormat.format(String, Object...) method. This class provides a mechanism to replace placeholders in a format string with the corresponding arguments in a structured and localized manner.

This class is immutable and thread-safe.

      Description copied from interface: MessageFormatter
      Formats the given format string by replacing placeholders with the provided arguments.

      NOTE: The formatting process is implementation defined.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      fmt - the format string containing placeholders to be replaced
      args - the arguments to replace the placeholders in the format string
      Returns:
      the formatted string where placeholders are replaced with the corresponding arguments

    • getFormatStyle

      public MessageFormatter.FormatStyle getFormatStyle()
      Description copied from interface: MessageFormatter
      Retrieves the formatting style currently in use by the MessageFormatter.

      The formatting style determines the approach taken for formatting messages or processing text input, see MessageFormatter.FormatStyle for details.

      Specified by:
